item.title: MidnightSun CTF - frank
item.description: Link MidnightSun CTF - frank Hello world, This writeup is about Midnight Sun CTF [frank] challenge on how to recover a full RSA private key, when half of it is erased. Challenge therefore requires recovering the entire RSA key from this image : Link Get the part of the private key visible: The first step of the challenge is to recover the visible part, to do this I quickly created a small OCR script with the pytesseract module in Python, to facilitate the recovery task.
